ChangeNotes.Value:
v1.3.13.4 Added Settlement commands to change with settlment a villae is bound to - gm.settlement.set_village_bound_settlement - gm.settlement.set_village_trade_bound_settlement
Fixed Several Minor Hero Issues - Fixed generated heroes not showing their troop influence and captain perks in battle deployment - Fixed generated heroes being level 10 with enough xp to go way beyond level 10 causing them to level up 10+ levels after one or two battles - Fixed some heroes being generated at age 16 instead of as an adult - Generated Heroes leading parties will no longer prefer to upgrade troops to cavalry, and will not upgrade troops more evenly - Generated Heroes now get assigned a random date to die based on them reaching a random age of 55-92 years old
